1. Connect to Sonar

Request an authentication token and connect a user to the backend server. To simplify things in this example, we use the REST API from the browser. Normally, you would generate and distribute tokens from the server-side.

Name to be displayed to other users.

Connecting to server...
...

2. Join Channel

Again, in this example, the browser uses the REST API to connect current client to a channel. Normally, this would be handled server-side by you.

If not existing server-side it will be created ad-hoc. Otherwise, client will just join.

Joining channel...

3. In a channel

Great, you joined the requested channel. Use the list of users to see who's talking and to mute users.

Join another channel
